metadata.purpose: Track recent registrations to prevent duplicate submissions
metadata.notes: This file is automatically updated by PHP registration forms. Old entries (>30 days) are automatically purged to keep file size manageable.

instructions.usage: PHP registration forms check this file before accepting new registrations
instructions.eventRegistrations: Store as array of email addresses under event ID key
instructions.trainingRegistrations: Store as array of email addresses under training ID key
instructions.donationRegistrations: Store as array of objects with email, date, and amount
instructions.duplicateCheck: Before accepting registration, check if email exists in array for that specific event/training
instructions.automaticCleanup: Set up cron job to remove entries older than 30 days every night at midnight
instructions.backupRecommendation: Weekly backup recommended before automatic cleanup
